name: Geiss - Cepiasound
milkdrop_raw:
[preset00]

fGammaAdj=1.994

fVideoEchoAlpha=0
nVideoEchoOrientation=0
nWaveMode=2
bAdditiveWaves=0
bWaveDots=0
bWaveThick=1
bModWaveAlphaByVolume=1
bMaximizeWaveColor=1
bTexWrap=1
bDarkenCenter=0

bBrighten=0
bDarken=0
bSolarize=0

fWaveSmoothing=0.9
fWaveParam=0
fModWaveAlphaStart=1.05
fModWaveAlphaEnd=1.39

fWarpScale=1
fZoomExponent=1
fShader=0
zoom=1.065
rot=0
cx=0.5
cy=0.5
dx=0
dy=0
warp=0.28
sx=1
sy=1
wave_r=1
wave_g=0.6
wave_b=0.2
wave_x=0.5
wave_y=0.5
ob_size=0.01

ob_g=0
ob_b=0
ob_a=0

per_frame_1=wave_g = wave_g + 0.100*( 0.90*sin(0.583*time) + 0.10*sin(1.006*time) );
per_frame_2=wave_b = wave_b + 0.100*( 0.90*sin(0.993*time) + 0.10*sin(0.933*time) );
per_frame_3=zoom = zoom + 0.013*( 0.60*sin(0.339*time) + 0.40*sin(0.276*time) );
per_frame_4=rot = rot + 0.040*( 0.60*sin(0.381*time) + 0.40*sin(0.579*time) );
per_frame_5=cx = cx + 0.003*( 0.60*sin(0.471*time) + 0.40*sin(0.297*time) );
per_frame_6=cy = cy + 0.003*( 0.60*sin(0.379*time) + 0.40*sin(0.351*time) );
per_frame_7=dx = dx + 0.003*( 0.60*sin(0.234*time) + 0.40*sin(0.277*time) );
per_pixel_1=zoom=zoom+max(bass-1,0)*0.25*sin(rad*15);
